snippet.title: Darkweb Streamer Trailer | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2023
snippet.description:
darkwebSTREAMER is a psychological horror fully procedurally generated roguelite RPG streamer simulation game. Play as an occult streamer on a 90s dark web, surf the net to find the weirdest things you can to impress your viewers, and gain enough subscribers to become the #1 ranked streamer. Just one thing - the supernatural is real, and the more you engage with the darkness of the internet the more it engages with you. Try your best to survive your apartment becoming increasingly besieged by demons, spirits and the occasional superfan as you persist in your quest to get famous -- or die trying.

Featuring the world's first infinite procedurally generated internet, emergent narrative gameplay with worlds and stories that change every playthrough, characters that live and develop alongside you, juicy Twitch integration, and an endlessly replayable horror experience.

www.pcgamer.com

Twitter: twitter.com/PCGamer
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pcgamer_mag
Instagram: @pcgamer_mag
Facebook: facebook.com/pcgamermagazine
Forum: forums.pcgamer.com

To subscribe to the magazine in the US, UK, or elsewhere, visit magazines direct

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgamingshow #darkwebstreamer
